Text.Page:
. I have located the first stone. Please come find me in Highwatch.

- Meren

While searching for the Earth Stone, you met a troubled supplier named Nimotz, and decided to lend a hand.
After helping Nimotz, you were able to retrieve the Earth Stone, and merge it with the crown.

Greetings, . How have you been?

Hmm...I can see that you're already stronger!
I've been gathering more information about the stones, and I believe I've located the Earth Stone.

But...we have a situation."What situation?"

The stone was in a shipment of banquet materials headed here.

However, we haven't heard from Nimotz, the Banquet Supplier, and there's no sign of the suppliesâ€”not to mention the stone.

We have dispatched a search party to find Nimotz. , will you help with the search?"Where should I start looking?"

We've checked several likely places along his planned route, but found nothing.

There weren't any signs of an attack...so I guess he could be staying with a relative, or he's on the Island of Dawn...

Why the Island of Dawn?

According to the Flight Manager, the last pegasus that Nimotz used was headed to the Island of Dawn."Do you think he's still there?"

Well...

We'll need to check the Flight Manager on the island to be certain.

Here, take this Teleportal Scroll and check in with {@linkcreature:13#5011#Tamarang}.

If you find Nimotz, please urge him to hurry back to Velika.
Meanwhile, I'll check in at his relative's residence.

Hello, !
Welcome to the Island of Dawn!

Did you come to take a flight?"Actually..."

The pegasus log? Nimotz, you say...?

...

Niman...Nimono...Nimotz! Here it is!

There's only an arrival entry under the name Nimotz.
Wait a minute...I remember him!
How could I forget that devastated face?"Are you sure?"

Yes, he was mumbling and shaking as though he were being haunted.
How could I forget that?

He had all these packed belongings with him, but left them behind here and there.

Go to the Dock Entrance.
That's where you'll find a bunch of his discarded {@LinkObject:133#belongings}.

Who are you?

What...? Meren sent you...?

I'm sorry! I'll take these back right away, I swear!
Just, please...I need a little more time!"What happened?"

Well, you see...while sailing, my boat got swamped by a sudden swell...and the banquet supplies are all waterlogged.

They're ruined...and they'd cost a fortune to replace!

So...I the only option left...was to craft them myself. That's why I came all the way here.
But I didn't realize...the materials had to be obtained from monsters..."What happened to the Earth Stone?"

Ah, yes, the stone!

That was the most important item, so I kept it myself.

Eh...Guardian? Could you please help me?

You can have the stone now, and I know that's all you're really after, but...I'll lose all my clients if everyone knows I failed to deliver for the banquet!

Please have mercy!"Calm down, I'll help you."

Thank you! Thank you!
May the goddess bless you!
Here's a list of what I need. Just come back to me once you've gathered all the materials.

This is my Personal Teleportal Scroll. It should come in handy.

Thank you...and good luck!

You're back! Let's see...

Indeed, you gathered the finest materials!
I could use this Basilisk Skin for a carpet and that Ovoliths's Web to make some silk.
The Orisk Oil can be used in all sorts of goods.

....with so many materials, I could make a fortune..."Fortune?"

What? No, no, it's nothing. Thank you so much!

I can head back to Velika now.
I think I've got everything I need to fulfill my job as Banquet Supplier now.

Here's the stone.

I'll head to Velika now.

The materials...
How much longer should we wait?

Nimotz came back with the banquet goods.

Well, actually the materials, but that's better than nothing.

Thank you so much.

Now we can get this banquet prepared!

By the way, did you find the Earth Stone?"Take a look for yourself."

The crown has recovered more of its original form.
Thank you.

Take this, it should help you retrieve the other stones.

Restoring the crown is the most important part of the banquet.

I'll let you know when I have more information on the stones.

May the goddess be with you.
